price: Nnuaba (ahodoͻ nyinaa bi) wͻ hͻ ma wͻn, na wͻnsa bεka deε wͻbɛbisa biara.
arabic: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā fākihatun walahum mā yaddaʿūna
